name: uikit
title: UIkit
description: UIkit is a lightweight and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces.

scripts.compile-less: npm run compile-less-core & npm run compile-less-components
scripts.compile: npm run compile-less & npm run compile-js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-less & npm run watch-js
scripts.compile-less-core: lessc --rootpath=../src/less/ --relative-urls src/less/theme/_import.less > css/uikit.theme.css && lessc --rootpath=../../src/less/core/ --relative-urls src/less/core/_import.less > css/uikit.core.css
scripts.compile-less-components: mkdir css/components & lessc-each src/less/components css/components/core  --rootpath=../src/less/ --relative-urls && lessc-each src/less/theme/components css/components/theme  --rootpath=../src/less/ --relative-urls
